overview: Horror films dominated the cultural conversation this year. From the surprise hit "Get Out" to the movie adaption of "It" to the campy "Happy Death Day", scary movies had an unusual hold on the collective imagination in 2017. Maybe it's because reality was pretty horrifying, too. To punctuate the end of this hair-raising year, we asked ten actors who gave the best performances to play a series of eerie roles.
tagline: 2017's BEST ACTORS IN A SERIES OF SHORT FRIGHTENING FILMS
title: Horror Show
